title: Sorel Women's Lennox Lace Cozy Waterproof Boot
features: Warm Comfort: These lace-up boots are great for outdoor activities. The waterproof build on these rugged boots lets you call the shots for adventures in wet conditions. Your feet will stay dry and comfortable, so you can avoid developing blisters

Support & Stability: The platform distributes weight more evenly for more stability and comfort on the arches and balls of your feet. The high-quality lug sole provides abrasion resistance and excellent traction
Ergonomic Design: The cozy, memory foam-like EVA insole helps you have good footing. These are easy to pair with your fall and winter outfits, and have a nylon heel pull tab

Durable Materials: Authentic full-grain leather and suede prevent immediate wear and tear and makes these shoes fashionable. Seam-sealed waterproof construction, rubber heel, and toe caps provide enhanced durability, as do the materials and traction design

Stylish Protection: These versatile shoes for women are perfect for cold or rainy days. Their waterproof outer and cozy faux shearling lining can protect your feet against harsh conditions of winter. Non-slip feature helps you avoid injuries
description: Super soft on the inside, this women's winter boot brings slipper-level cozy to everyday adventures. Its waterproof design blocks out bad weather.LEATHER CARE GUIDEThe city is unpredictable, and acquiring scuffs, nicks, and dirt along the way is inevitable. We wanted to provide you with a guide on how to care for your leatherâ€”so you can keep that fresh-out-of-the-box look for as long as possible.FOR WATERPROOF LEATHER:Step 1: Use a medium-bristle brush to remove dirt or debris (we recommend one made specifically for cleaning leather.)Step 2: Wipe shoes with a damp cloth.Step 3: Let dry in a cool, dry place.FOR OILED LEATHER/DRY-TANNED LEATHER:Step 1: Remove dirt, or debris, with a dry cloth.Step 2: Use a clean cloth dipped in a bit of leather cleaner all over shoes.Step 3: Wipe shoes with a damp cloth to remove residue.Step 4: Let dry in a cool, dry place.FOR NUBUCK/SUEDE LEATHER:Step 1: Use a soft brush to remove dirt, or debris (we recommend one made specifically for nubuck/suede leather.)*Note: leather is a natural product and will have its own unique characteristics, marks, or imperfections. Some leather may have color variations, small markings or scratches. These are a natural part of the character and don't affect the quality or durability of the leather.Founded in 1962, SOREL combines expert craftsmanship and of-the-moment design to create all-season footwear. What began decades ago with premium boots, crafted with an unparalleled balance of construction and protection, is now a brand dedicated to both functionality and fashion. Here at SOREL, we believe you are your most powerful tool and the determination you find within is an unstoppable force. SOREL challenges the status quo by creating unexpected footwear that pushes the boundaries of function-first fashion. We stay in motion so you can push yourself forward.
